titles.title: To clarify that the licensing of a mark, and any control or exercise of control thereof for certain purposes, does not create an employment or principal-agent relationship, and for other purposes.
Trademark Licensing Protection Act of 2018
Trademark Licensing Protection Act of 2018
Trademark Licensing Protection Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Trademark Licensing Protection Act of 2018
This bill states that licensing a trademark to a related company does not create an employment relationship between the trademark owner and the company taking the license.
